text: أَتَىٰٓ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُوهُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

translation.en: The command of Allah is coming, so be not impatient for it. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him
translation.id: (Ketetapan Allah448) pasti datang, maka janganlah kamu meminta agar dipercepat (datang)nya. Mahasuci Allah dan Mahatinggi Dia dari apa yang mereka persekutukan
